Description:
Offering free WiFi and sea views, Jørgensengården is an accommodation set in Andenes. Situated 1.1 km from Haugnessanden Beach, the property features a garden and free private parking.

The villa has 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with city views.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the villa.

The nearest airport is Andoya, Andenes, 1 km from Jørgensengården, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Jørgensengården in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Facing the beachfront in Bleik, Midnattsol rom og hytter features a shared lounge and barbecue facilities. There is a terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

Guest rooms at the guest house are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Each room comes with a kettle, while certain rooms include a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. At Midnattsol rom og hytter rooms include bed linen and towels.

The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at the accommodation.

The nearest airport is Andoya, Andenes Airport, 10 km from Midnattsol rom og hytter.

Description:
Sentralen inn is a detached holiday home with a barbecue, situated in Andenes in the Nordland Region. The holiday home comes with air conditioning and free WiFi. Free private parking is available on site.

There is a seating area and a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is available. There is a shared bathroom with a shower.

The closest airport, Andøya airport is 1 km from the property, and has direct flights from Oslo Airport. Harstad / Narvik airport is 198 km away. Hurtigruten Terminal Risøyhamn is located 50 km away and Skagen airport is 123 km from the property. Please note that  bed linen and towels are not included in the price. You can renet it on place and the price is 50 NOK for a set of bed linen/towels or you can bring your own.

Description:
Set in Andenes in the Nordland region, with Haugnessanden Beach nearby, Tore Hunds Apartments offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. Some units feature a balcony and/or a patio with city views.

If you would like to discover the area, skiing and windsurfing are possible in the surroundings.

The nearest airport is Andoya, Andenes Airport, 2 km from Tore Hunds Apartments. Please inform Tore Hunds Apartments in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
